disclaimer.title: Learn how reviews work
disclaimer.subtitle: Reviews from past guests help our community learn more about each home. By default, reviews are sorted by recency. Only the guest who booked the reservation can leave a review, and Airbnb only moderates reviews flagged for not following our policies. To be eligible for a percentile ranking or guest favorite label, listings need 5 or more recent reviews. Criteria is subject to change. Learn more in our Help Center

section.brandDescription:
This place is a guest favorite‚Äî
one of the top-rated homes on Airbnb.

content.htmlText:
Located in a central area, in a few minutes you will be in the towns of Verbania, Fondotoce, Feriolo, Mergozzo, Baveno, Stresa.

In front of the house there is a natural beach suitable for those who want privacy and solitude while, just a 4-minute walk away, you can reach the equipped "TrePonti" beach, modernized in 2022 and equipped with all services including a lifeguard.

From the house you can comfortably access the bike path that runs along the lake and allows you to reach the towns with restaurants, pharmacies, bars and shops in a few moments. Also thanks to the bike path, you can easily reach the Fondotoce Nature Reserve, with the possibility of continuing to the Val d'Ossola.

Easily reachable are Val Grande, Val Vigezzo, Val Formazza, Val Anzasca for wonderful mountain excursions.

Located in a central area, in a few minutes you will be in the towns of Verbania, Fondotoce, Feriolo, Mergozzo, Baveno, Stresa.

In front of the house there is a natural beach suitable for those who want privacy and solitude while, just a 4-minute walk away, you can reach the equipped "TrePonti" beach, modernized in 2022 and equipped with all services including a lifeguard.

From the house you can comfortably access the bike path that runs along the lake and allows you to reach the towns with restaurants, pharmacies, bars and shops in a few moments. Also thanks to the bike path, you can easily reach the Fondotoce Nature Reserve, with the possibility of continuing to the Val d'Ossola.

Easily reachable are Val Grande, Val Vigezzo, Val Formazza, Val Anzasca for wonderful mountain excursions.

From the Baveno or Verbania highway exit, it's a 10-minute drive.
Verbania-Pallanza train station is a 10-minute drive, 15-minute bike ride or 50-minute walk.

Suna is a 5-minute drive, 6-minute bike ride or 20-minute walk.

htmlDescription.htmlText:
"Casa Lina" is a beautiful accommodation overlooking the Borromeo Gulf, one minute from the lake and beaches. Direct access to the bike path to reach towns and natural oases.

Renovated according to the original style, it overlooks the shared courtyard that allows total freedom to spend moments of pure relaxation.

The space
The 67 sqm accommodation opens onto the hallway from which you can access all the areas of the house: equipped kitchen, double bedroom, dining room, living room with sofa bed and bathroom with shower.

Sheets and towels are provided.

The double bed is 150x200cm.
The comfortable sofa bed is 160x200cm.

Guest access
"Casa Lina" is located in the main house on the mezzanine floor, access includes some steps.

Private parking is available on the side of the house, accessible via a narrow private road with a maximum width of 2.40 meters.

Bus stop in front.
Nearest train stop Verbania-Pallanza.

Registration number
IT103072C2I292829C

reviews.comments: Die Wohnung ist sehr sch√∂n gelegen direkt am Seeufer, man kann allerdings die viel befahrene Stra√üe h√∂ren. Sie ist super ausgestattet und gem√ºtlich. Lodana und Lele waren super Gastgeber, wir haben uns sehr willkommen gef√ºhlt.

localizedReview.comments: The apartment is very nicely located directly on the lake shore, but you can hear the busy road. It is superbly equipped and cozy. Lodana and Lele were great hosts, we felt very welcome.

reviews.comments: Vielen Dank f√ºr die Unterkunft. Wir hatten einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt und kommen gerne wieder.

localizedReview.comments: Thanks for the accommodation. We had a very pleasant stay and would be happy to come back.

reviews.comments:
Nous avons pass√© un agr√©able s√©jour chez Lodana.
La maison est sublime et tr√®s bien √©quip√©e.
Lodana a √©t√© tr√®s accueillante et est tr√®s r√©active.
Nous recommandons ce logement avec plaisir !

localizedReview.comments:
We had a pleasant stay at Lodana's.
The house is sublime and very well-equipped.
Lodana was very welcoming and is very responsive.
We would recommend this listing with pleasure!

reviews.comments: Eine Unterkunft mit viel Herz zum Wohlf√ºhlen, samt lebendigem "Kuscheltier". Gem√ºtlich, in Strandn√§he, mit einer tollen Terrasse und einer liebevoll eingerichteten Wohnung, mit allem, was f√ºr einen gelungenen Urlaub wichtig ist. Lodana und ihr Mann sind herzliche Gastgeber und √ºberraschten uns mit ihren schmackhaften "Sch√§tzen" aus ihrem Garten. Lieben Dank f√ºr eure liebe, gro√üz√ºgige Gastfreundschaft, wir haben uns sehr wohl bei eich gef√ºhlt, liebe Gr√º√üe, Ela und Claudio

localizedReview.comments: A home with a lot of heart to feel good, including a lively "cuddly toy." Cozy, close to the beach, with a great terrace and a lovingly furnished apartment, with all the essentials for a successful vacation. Lodana and her husband are warm hosts and surprised us with their tasty "treasures" from their garden. Thank you very much for your kind, generous hospitality, we felt very comfortable with you, best regards, Ela and Claudio

reviews.comments:
Jolie maison avec un accueil chaleureux et accompagn√© d‚Äôun panier de l√©gumes du jardin d√©licieux.
Nous avons pass√© un excellent s√©jour.

localizedReview.comments:
Nice house with a warm welcome and accompanied by a basket of delicious garden vegetables.
We had a great stay.

reviews.comments: belle maison de famille et accueil chaleureux par Lodana et L√©l√©.

localizedReview.comments: beautiful family home and warm welcome by Lodana and L√©l√©.

reviews.comments:
Nous avons pass√© un s√©jour magnifique avec ma femme et mes 2 enfants en bas √¢ge.
D'abord la situation de la maison est exceptionnelle, avec la vue lac depuis la belle terrasse et la plage accessible √† pied.
Ensuite le logement est spacieux, tr√®s fonctionnel et d√©cor√© avec beaucoup de soin.
Et enfin - et surtout ! - Lodana e Lelle sont 2 h√¥tes exceptionnels.
La communication a √©t√© simple et facile.
Leur grande gentillesse et leurs nombreuses attention ont beaucoup contribu√© √† rendre notre s√©jour excellent.
Une impression de se sentir comme √† la maison.
Grazie mille !

localizedReview.comments:
We had a wonderful stay with my wife and 2 toddlers.
First the location of the house is exceptional, with the lake view from the beautiful terrace and the beach within walking distance.
Then the accommodation is spacious, very functional and decorated with great care.
And finally - and most importantly! - Lodana e Lelle are 2 exceptional hosts.
Communication was simple and easy.
Their great kindness and lots of attention went a long way in making our stay a great one.
A feeling of feeling at home.
Grazie mille!

reviews.comments:
Wir hatten eine ganz wunderbare Zeit in dieser sehr sympathischen Wohnung am Lago Maggiore. Mit zwei kleinen Kindern war die Gr√∂√üe und Lage perfekt, man kann sehr gut Ausfl√ºge von hier aus machen und auch der fu√ül√§ufig erreichbare Strand ist nett. Einziges kleines Manko waren die fehlenden M√ºckengitter an den Fenstern, wir haben deshalb abends immer die Fenster geschlossen gehalten.
Wir hoffe hier irgendwann zur√ºckzukehren und werden die Unterkunft bestimmt auch Freunden empfehlen!

localizedReview.comments:
We had a wonderful time in this very likeable apartment on Lake Maggiore. With two small children, the size and location was perfect, you can make excursions from here very well and also the beach within walking distance is nice. The only small drawback was the missing mosquito screens on the windows, so we always kept the windows closed in the evening.
We hope to return here at some point and will definitely recommend the place to friends!

reviews.comments:
Nous avons pass√© un excellent s√©jour √† la casa Lina, logement fort bien situ√© pour profiter des promenades et activit√©s touristiques du lieu.
Lodana a √©t√© une h√¥tesse tout √† fait charmante et disponible ! Un grand merci √† elle pour toutes ces petites attentions ! Les enfants se sont beaucoup plus dans cet environnement, et nous aussi .
Et quelle vue magnifique sur le lac Majeur !

localizedReview.comments:
We had a great time at the casa Lina, very well located accommodation to enjoy the walks and tourist activities of the place.
Lodana was a lovely and available host! A big thank you to her for all these little touches! The kids are much more in this environment, and so are we.
And what a beautiful view of Lake Maggiore!

reviews.comments: A beautiful location with an amazing view and friendly neighbors to boot. Gives you a great taste of what life in Northern Italy is like. Very spacious and nice area to sit outside. Our kids were able to play and be at ease. It is about a 30 min walk to the main beach and city center, but there is a beach within a 10 min walk that is nice and not crowded. I recommend driving everywhere else as some of the areas don‚Äôt have sidewalks. There is a large, two-lane shared sidewalk (walkers/bikers) on the road in front, but it ends at certain points along the route. The nearest playground is a 30 min walk, if you have kids. Also, if you are planning to do laundry, during the summer the humidity makes it impossible to dry, but we found a great laundromat in Stresa where you can wash and dry one load of laundry in less than an hour. Overall, this place is definitely worth a visit! The owners are next door and super friendly.
Sehr nette und dabei nicht aufdringliche Gastgeber, gute Ausstattung der Wohnung. Sch√∂ner Seeblick, leider liegt zwischen der Ferienwohnung und dem See die Durchgangsstrasse.

localizedReview.comments: Very nice and not intrusive hosts, good amenities of the apartment. Beautiful lake view, unfortunately the thoroughfare is located between the apartment and the lake.

reviews.comments: A very beautiful and comfortable apartment with a stunning terrace and lake view
Ruim en schoon appartement. Hele aardige host, zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Mooi uitzicht over het meer.

localizedReview.comments: Spacious and clean apartment. Very nice host, very friendly and helpful. Beautiful view over the lake.

reviews.comments: We hebben een fantastisch verblijf gehad hier. Prachtig appartement met fantastisch uitzicht, op slechts 15 minuten van Stresa. Veel dingen te doen in de omgeving. De host is ontzettend vriendelijk. Absolute aanrader!

localizedReview.comments: We had a fantastic stay here. Wonderful apartment with fantastic views, just 15 minutes from Stresa. Lots of things to do in the area. The host is incredibly friendly. Absolutely recommended!

reviews.comments: wur haben uns sehr wohl gef√ºhlt

localizedReview.comments: we felt very comfortable

reviews.comments: Unser Aufenthalt war super! Vor allem unseren tierischen Gastgeber haben wir ins Herz geschlossen. Gute Lage am See.

localizedReview.comments: Our stay was great! We especially loved our animal hosts. Good lakes location.

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment, fully furnished with an amazing view to the lake, peaceful and quiet, would definitely recommend it!
A great apartment with a patio and a lake view second to none. Great host, very friendly and helpful, always online and answering whatever questions come up right away.

Wunderbare Wohnung mit herrlicher Aussicht. Sehr schnelle und freundliche Kommunikation.
Wir hatten einen sehr sch√∂nen Aufenthalt!

localizedReview.comments:
Wonderful apartment with great views. Very fast and friendly communication.
We had a very nice stay!

reviews.comments:
We loved our stay.
The view was amazing, the place had everything we needed and was so incredible clean.
We felt at home right away and could honestly have stayed forever. It was even cosy and wonderful on the rainy days.
Would book again in a heartbeat.

Stayed almost a month at Lodana‚Äôs place, and that month was amazing.
The place itself was cosy with own cute gardens, small-scale greenhouse farming facilities, and the Lake views were first thing you woke up to. Natural park and cosy small towns with good restaurants (some old Michelin recommended - eg Antica Osteria il Monte Rosso) in a walking distance.
However, Lodana herself was what made the place truly special. Very well caring, responsive and pleasant person to interact with!
Highly recommended!!
Tolle Unterkunft, sehr saubere und  authentische Wohnung, sehr nette Vermieter. Hat uns super  gefallen.

localizedReview.comments: Great place, very clean and  authentic place very nice landlords. We loved  it.

reviews.comments: Merci Lodana pour votre disponibilit√©, votre gentillesse et pour l'accueil chaleureux ! Nous avons pass√© un merveilleux moment √† Localita Tre Ponti et le logement y a contribu√©. Nous recommandons totalement ce B&B. Le logement est parfait pour 3 personnes : tr√®s propre, bien √©quip√© (parking et int√©rieur), calme et confortable. Il y a un jardin avec une table, ce qui permet de profiter de la superbe vue sur le lac qui est √† 2 pas du logement, ainsi que 2 plages. Les commerces et le joli centre de Verbania sont √† 45min √† pied. Beaucoup de randonn√©es sont facilement accessibles en voiture.

localizedReview.comments: Thank you Lodana for your availability, your kindness and for the warm welcome! We had a wonderful time at Localita Tre Ponti and the place contributed to it. We totally recommend this B&B. The accommodation is perfect for 3 people: very clean, well-equipped (parking and indoor), quiet and comfortable. There is a garden with a table, which allows you to enjoy the superb view of the lake which is 2 steps from the accommodation, as well as 2 beaches. Shops and the pretty center of Verbania are a 45 min walk away. Many hikes are within easy driving distance.

reviews.comments: Lodana und Lele sind super freundliche und liebevolle Gastgeber. Die Wohnung in dem Haus, dass schon seit Ewigkeiten in Familienbesitz ist, l√§dt direkt zum Verweilen ein. Die Einrichtung ist perfekt f√ºr das ultimative  wie-in-Italien-Leben-Gef√ºhl. Die Aussicht ist der Wahnsinn und alle Anwohner die wir getroffen haben waren herzlich. Wir w√ºrden jederzeit gerne wiederkommen.

localizedReview.comments: Lodana and Lele are super friendly and lovely host. The apartment in the house, which has been family-owned for ages, invites you to linger. The furnishings are perfect for the ultimate in-in-can life feeling. The views are amazing and all the residents we met were warm. We would love to come again anytime.

reviews.comments:
Der Aufenthalt war wundersch√∂n. Die Wohnung gro√üz√ºgig, authentisch und sehr sauber. F√ºr uns und unsere zwei Kinder (1 und 3 Jahre alt) war alles bestens geeignet. Die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich und gut erreichbar.
Es war eine ideale Basis f√ºr viele Ausfl√ºge an den Lago Maggiore, die Nachbarseen und in die Alpen.

localizedReview.comments:
The stay was beautiful. The apartment is generous, authentic and very clean. For us and our two children (1 and 3 years old) everything was ideally suited. The hosts were very friendly and easily accessible.
It was an ideal base for many excursions to Lake Maggiore, the neighboring lakes and the Alps.

reviews.comments: We had an absolute amazing stay with our 2 small children. The view + outdoor seating is amazing! One day we did not even leave the house and just chilled in & around the house. We loved walking down to the small beach too (5 mins). The house is very well maintained and organised. Everything we could wish for for a couple nights on our way back home. We will be back!

Great flat that's very close to a small beach. We felt very welcome and were greeted with a big home grown vegetable basket. Very nice view and awesome garden with great seating opportunity. Be aware the owners only speak Italian.

The stay here was wonderful:
beautiful view,
great location,the terrace so lovely
and the host very friendly and helping with great ideas for nice restaurants!
would recommand it to everybody!

Un bel appartement avec acc√®s √† une petite cour, vue √©poustouflante sur le lac depuis la cour et m√™me depuis l'int√©rieur! Possibilit√© d'acc√©der √† une petite plage peu fr√©quent√©e en 7 minutes √† pied! Logement tr√®s propre, cuisine fonctionnelle, belle salle √† manger avec vue, salle de bain fonctionnelle. Tr√®s bon accueil des propri√©taires avec un panier de l√©gumes de leur potager et une bouteille de vin!
Il faut savoir qu'une route tr√®s passante juste en dessous de la maison, il y a donc un certain bruit.

localizedReview.comments:
A beautiful apartment with access to a small courtyard, breathtaking views of the lake from the yard and even from the inside! Possibility to access a small uncrowded beach in 7 minutes on foot! Very clean accommodation, functional kitchen, beautiful dining room with view, functional bathroom bathroom. Very good welcome from the owners with a basket of vegetables from their vegetable garden and a bottle of wine!
You should know that a very busy road just below the house, so there is some noise.

reviews.comments: Lodana heeft ons super ontvangen met heerlijke groenten en fruit uit de tuin en Italiaanse prosecco. Het appartement was heel proper en groter dan op de foto's. Het was heel charmant en was goed gelegen, op 5 minuten rijden van een grote Lidl, 10 minuten van Verbania en 15 minuten van Stresa. Milaan is ook maar 1u30min met de trein. Desondanks ze geen Engels kon hebben verliep de communicatie vlot. Het strans ligt op 10 minuten wandelen vanuit het appartement heb je een prachtig uitzicht op het meer. Despite being unable to have English, communication was smooth. The strans is a 10 minute walk from the apartment you will have an amazing view of the lake. Definitely worth repeating.

We felt very comfortable with Lodana and Lele and were warmly welcomed by everyone including the cats. The location is great, the house is very close to the lake without having to climb too many steps and by car it is no problem anyway.
A very nice beach with kiosk and lifeguard is only a 5-minute walk away, and restaurants in Suna, for example, are also within walking distance.
Shops like Lidl are also a few minutes away by car and you can reach the Val Grande for a hike in 35 minutes.

reviews.comments: Great place to stay!! The owners have sweet cats which sometimes come and visit :) the check in was super easy and the owners are very friendly. We felt like home!
